column2: "Come to think of it... Harriet said \"this country\", but there are other nations, correct?"

"This continent is divided into four
nations - north, south, east, and west."

"This land is called Cuent. It's the southern
nation, known for its nature and magic."
"I am the second child of the late King of Cuent."
"As I mentioned earlier, my goal is to return this land back to its peaceful state."
"To do so, we need a figurehead. Because I am of noble birth, I must stand before my people."
"If it helps you to understand, then yes, I am of royalty."
"Nevertheless, even if you're royalty, there are times when it becomes necessary to fight."
"The usurper Prime Minister Lutz, who bathed in the power and greed that Ephimera provides..."
"He caused a coup d'etat that cost my father his life, and is causing us to be hunted within our own kingdom."
"Now, Lutz calls himself \"King\" and places a burden on our people by seeking expansion and flaunting his strength."
"As royalty, we must overthrow Lutz's tyranny."
"We cannot allow this nation to be led into a pointless war by a madman."
"<%me>... There's someone I want you to meet, so we can discuss the future of this nation."
